title: FS: (2) T206 Ty Cobb both Red SOLD and Green BOTH SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: (2) T206 Ty Cobb both Red SOLD and Green BOTH SOLD
posts.post_content:
I am adding a Cobb red to yesterday's listing for the green.  This one is graded SGC 5.5 and is nearly identical to the one that just sold on eBay: [url]https://www.ebay.com/itm/144100014380[/url]

I am asking SOLD for the red and [STRIKE]$7950[/STRIKE] SOLD for the green, net to me including the shipping.

Because I am new on this forum I am happy to accommodate any payment details that we are both comfortable with.

Thanks for looking.
Steve
